meanings.definition: In a manner involving risk or danger.
meanings.sent1: She walked riskily along the edge of the cliff.
meanings.sent2: He drove riskily through the heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The cat riskily balanced on the narrow fence.
meanings.sent4: The tightrope walker riskily danced across the thin rope.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter riskily entered the burning building to save the trapped puppy.

meanings.definition: In a way that is likely to result in harm or loss.
meanings.sent1: He spent his money riskily on the risky investment.
meanings.sent2: She played riskily with the fragile vase.
meanings.sent3: The child riskily climbed the tall tree despite being told not to.
meanings.sent4: The gambler riskily bet all his savings on one hand of cards.
meanings.sent5: The explorer riskily ventured into the uncharted jungle, hoping to find treasure.
